name: misc-utils-of-mine-dom
description: Miscellaneous utilities related to DOM that I often use

scripts.test-js: npm run clean && npm run build && npx jest --testMatch "**/__tests__/**/*.js"
scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test-js && npm run test
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && git commit -a -m "version patch" && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npx shx rm -rf dist/**/__tests__
